sen.j: 田目皇子（ため の みこ、敏達天皇元年（572年）? - 没年不詳）は用明天皇の第一皇子。
sen.e: Prince Tame (572 - year of death unknown) was the first son of Emperor Yomei.
Prince Tame (Tame no miko, 572 - year of death unknown) was the first son of Emperor Yomei.
sen.cmt: ため の みこ、を入れました。
sen.e: Prince Tame (Tame no miko, 572 - year of death unknown) was the first son of Emperor Yomei.
His mother was SOGA no (蘇我石付名姫).
His mother was SOGA no (蘇我石付名姫).
His mother was SOGA no (蘇我石付名姫).

sen.j: 子に男子一人と佐富女王がいる。
sen.e: He had a son and Princess Satomi.
He had a son and Princess Satomi.
He had a son and Princess Satomi.

sen.j: ただ、用明天皇の死後、義母の穴穂部間人皇女と結婚したという。
sen.e: But it is said he married ANAHOBE no Hashihitohime after Emperor Yomei died.
But it is said he married ANAHOBE no Hashihitohime after Emperor Yomei died.
But it is said he married ANAHOBE no Hashihitohime after Emperor Yomei died.
